## Description {#details}

Contains the information about the kind of vectorization available.

This object in independent on the paradigm used to represent vector functions. in particular, it is not attached to any target-specific ABI.

Definition at line 83 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/vfabidemangler-h">VFABIDemangler.h</a>.
